item.title: Introduction to Python 3
item.description: Slides Basics Lab Slides ch1 ch2 ch3 ch4 Basics print("Hello world") 1 + 2 # Out[1]: 3 print( 1 + 2 ) # 3 print( 2 - 1 ) # 1 print( 2 * 3 ) # 6 print( 4 / 2 ) # 2.0 print( 7 % 3 ) # 1 print( 4 ** 2 ) # 16 'ab' + 'cd' # 'abcd' height = 1.
